metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9751 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 6.x before 6.0.17 and 7.x before 7.0.5. An attacker who is logged into OTRS as an admin user may manipulate the URL to cause execution of JavaScript in the context of OTRS. This is related to Kernel/Output/Template/Document.pm.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
